channel.title: FreshScape 317 Development
channel.description:
I'm working on a server based off HyBrid PvP. I plan to fix a lot of the skills, as some are written half-assed. I want to work on this only to improve my programming abilities because I sound like an idiot on here.
Things I've done so far: VIP Status Fixed that gay pming thing Changed home [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/homechange.png[/img] Fixing economy Tickets [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/500mticket.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/1bticket.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/1.5bticket.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/2bticket.png[/img] Barrage orbs [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/23308394/barrageorb.png[/img]
If anyone has suggestions just post 'em here
Credits: lordy570(making HyBrid PvP), staypuff(1984) for fixing some black items, me for the updates and future ones.

item.description:

item.title: FreshScape 317 Development
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:10, topic:398768”][quote author=Mill link=topic=495904.msg3625922#msg3625922 date=1307832032]

VIP Status

Cause that’s hard to do

Fixed that gay pming thing

with a tutorial

Changed home

Not hard, and it’s still an overused and stupid home.

Good economy

OH SURE, thats why everyone in that pic behind you is in either, torva, claws, or a godsword…

Tickets

Supports my statement that your economy is still shit, you shouldn’t need tickets…

Move away from hybrid pvp.

I know the economy is shit I meant to say fixing economy jeez. No, I did not follow any tuts. Quit flaming, I’m not a pro.
[/quote]

That wasn’t flaming at all, I was just telling you what I saw/my opinions. If I was flaming it would of been way worse. Just trying to tell you it still needs ALOT of work.[/quote]
“Alot” is two words

Read full topic

I’m working on a server based off HyBrid PvP. I plan to fix a lot of the skills, as some are written half-assed. I want to work on this only to improve my programming abilities because I sound like an idiot on here.
